<div class = "top-container">
<center><b> <h1>What makes a type?</h1> </b></strong>
<br>
<center> A type is a group of census tracts in the Twin Cities region that have shared similar trends of demographic, built environment, and housing market changes from 2000 through 2017.</center>
<br>
<center> [More about the study and methodology](https://sullivannicole.github.io/Suburban-Change/background.html) </center>
---------------------
</div>
